attributes.action: None of the above on voting forms
attributes.additional_details:
With elections coming in the near future and people currently disillusioned with political parties today, there should be a greater choice when voting. There should be an option for people to vote without having to select a party.

I wish the government to add none of the above to voting forms.

rejection.details:
Please see the petition below:

Petition Title: Abstaining

Created by: Brian Whicher

Closing: 30/03/2015
